text: @realDonaldTrump Under you #COVID19 130k+ Americans died #RacialDivision the world is protesting against your racist movement and let's not forget  #EconomicDownfall you claim doesn't exist even though unemployment is at 13.3%, 4 years ago it was around 4%.
